app_descript:
Brief: "Demolish!" is a physics-based puzzle game where players can unleash their destructive side. With intuitive controls, users can knock down structures by launching various projectiles. Each level presents a unique challenge to demolish the structure in as few shots as possible, creating an addictive gameplay experience for those who enjoy puzzle-solving with a twist!
